a study done back in 2014 and
researchers found that the students who
took notes by hand performed better on
conceptual questions compared to those
who took notes with their laptops the
researchers also found that the
handwriting group had better recall and
comprehension than that laptop group so
what it shows is that the physical act
of writing something down by hand helps
with memory retention and the
researchers also propose that this may
be due to the fact that handwriting
requires more mental processing as the
students needed to selectively condense
information rather than just typing
everything out verbatim so if you want
to have a better memory just start to
write stuff down
